information.name: Simple Count Rows
information.description: This is a very simple example using Power BI Sidetools DAX generator
information.author: Didier Terrien

mappings.name: YourQuickMeasure
mappings.description: Name of the measure DAX generator will create (click to modify)

mappings.name: Parameter1
mappings.description: Table we want to count rows (click to modify)

mappings.name: Folder1
mappings.description: Name of folder that the measure will be placed in. (click to modify)

mappings.name: Description
mappings.description: Add a description for this measure. (click to modify)
